description: This file defines the interface IEventHandler with virtual methods for handling various OCI container events, such as start, stop, failure, and state change, using a string and JSON object parameters.

classes.name: IEventHandler
classes.description: Interface for handling OCI container events, with pure virtual callback methods.

methods.name: onOCIContainerStartedEvent
methods.description: Callback invoked when an OCI container starts, passing container name and data.

methods.name: onOCIContainerStoppedEvent
methods.description: Callback invoked when an OCI container stops, passing container name and data.

methods.name: onOCIContainerFailureEvent
methods.description: Callback invoked upon OCI container failure, passing container name and data.

methods.name: onOCIContainerStateChangedEvent
methods.description: Callback invoked when the OCI container's state changes, passing container name and data.
